mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CODE, MENU_TITLE, MENU_PARENT_CODE, MENU_SEQ, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_VISIBLE, MENU_ICON FROM METELSOS_CUSTOMER_LEFTMENU WHERE MENU_PARENT_CODE IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CODE = DECODE(MENU_CODE, MENU_PARENT_CODE, NULL, MENU_PARENT_CODE) START WITH MENU_CODE = 0 ORDER SIBLINGS BY MENU_SEQ ASC, MENU_CODE ASC
